job.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer

job.description: Full-Stack Software Engineer  Dedham MA - Hybrid  Full-time  Senior Full Stack Software Engineer will contribute to the design and build of software architecture and product suite and must have an understanding of large-scale, real-time integrations with external systems and user facing applications.
